name: Koollage
overview:
Koollage is a Web service that allows users to find, create, package, and share information among the Internet using friends by mashing up information into shareable “pods” packages on demand.

Web pages, images, videos, and the like can all be packaged into Koollage “pods,” to be shared between friends, who can add information and comment on them. Public pods can be viewed without logging in or even being a user of Koollage.

There are over 50 Million potential users from 3 segments:

  • Consumer marketers (bloggers, artists, job seekers, online sellers, hobbyists)
  • Small businesses (realtors, travel, dealerships, restaurants, retail, craftsmen)
  • Brands, Media and Corporate Marketing (company marketers distributing product and company information)

Viewers for Koollage pods is well over 200 Million worldwide
